item.title: By: Stef
item.dc:creator: Stef
item.description: Thank you so much for this recipe. I'm gluten free and love fajitas. I adapted your tortilla recipe so that it was gluten free and tweaked the fajita marinade a bit as well. I also used caramelised onions instead. I gave a nice sweet contrast the the tangy/spicy marinade. Check out my version of these fajitas if you've got time: http://myessentialingredients.blogspot.com/2010/06/fajitas-and-tortillas.html .
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much for this recipe. I’m gluten free and love fajitas. I adapted your tortilla recipe so that it was gluten free and tweaked the fajita marinade a bit as well. I also used caramelised onions instead. I gave a nice sweet contrast the the tangy/spicy marinade. Check out my version of these fajitas if you’ve got time: http://myessentialingredients.blogspot.com/2010/06/fajitas-and-tortillas.html .

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: those tortillas look pretty damn impressive, they puff up just like puff pastry and then go flat again. I should really give this a go, it looks super easy!
item.content:encoded: those tortillas look pretty damn impressive, they puff up just like puff pastry and then go flat again. I should really give this a go, it looks super easy!

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Everyone - Glad you like the home made tortillas, hope you get a chance to try your own. Thanks again for the comments :)
Hi Arwen - No, I haven't tried freezing them, good idea. We had them heated up the day after and they were still good. I'll let you know if/when I try freezing them.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Everyone – Glad you like the home made tortillas, hope you get a chance to try your own. Thanks again for the comments ðŸ™‚

Hi Arwen – No, I haven’t tried freezing them, good idea. We had them heated up the day after and they were still good. I’ll let you know if/when I try freezing them.
